timeline.bodyText:
You're changing this from immediately breaking out of optional-world to being half optional-style and half not.
Either do something like name.get().toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT).startsWith(lastKnownName), or continue the Optional chain so it terminates with an orElse(false), removing any use of isPresent or get.
timeline.author: zml2008

replies.bodyText: Initially I was going to continue with .filter(n -> n.startsWith(lastKnownName)) but variables in the lambda need to be effectively final. I'll just change it to the first option you suggested.
replies.author: alexstaeding

timeline.message: Convert GameProfile names to lowercase before comparing with lowercase lastKnownName
Convert GameProfile names to lowercase before comparing with lowercase lastKnownName
